name: Arkona
description: '''Arkona''' ({{langx|ru|Аркона}}) is a Russian [[folk metal]] band. Their lyrics are heavily influenced by [[Folklore of Russia|Russian folklore]] and [[Slavic mythology]], and their music incorporates several traditional Russian musical instruments. The name of the band "Arkona" refers to the last Pre-Christianized Slavic [[Jaromarsburg|city-castle]].
